extendedInfo.description: Play the best bubble puzzle adventure game from the makers of the super hit apps, "Save My Bird" and "Bubble Kingdom"!Shoot bubbles and match colors to pop and drop your way to rescue the trapped baby birds! Youâll be addicted to "Bubble Bird Rescue" from the first hit!âââââ Highlighted Features ââââââ Well-designed FREE levels - each with unique challenges and fun puzzles!â EASY TO LEARN - hard to master! Can you score 3 stars on every level?â Score Big Bonuses - drop large bunches of bubbles to score sweet bonuses!â UNLOCK powerful boosts to help with challenging levels!â Fresh and beautiful style, bright and vibrant graphics & effects!FREE update with more exciting levels and boosts are coming soon...

reviews.title: Won\'t play now
reviews.comment: The game was good when you could get past all of the many, many ads. But since the last update, the game won\'t even load, so I\'m uninstalling.
reviews.author: Stephanie Thomas

reviews.title: Poor Implementation of Downloadable Content
reviews.comment: I paid for some of the booster add-ons, and they have yet to show up in the game for me to use, even after restarting my phone. Also, I selected the 20 line extension booster, which was posted as $4.99 and actually paid $9.99. Probably something you may wanna fix.
reviews.author: Josh Young

reviews.title: I give 3 stars
reviews.comment: The only problem I have with this game is that you have to pay to skip levels and to play on when it is a difficult level!
reviews.author: Tammy DeVos

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I could and do spend more time than I should on saving these birds!
reviews.author: Joyce Barrow

reviews.title: Midnight
reviews.comment: This game is so addictive. Plays and loads great on thevsamsung galaxy tab 2
reviews.author: deanne johnson

reviews.title: Extremely good
reviews.comment: Its really fun to play always keep me on the edge
reviews.author: Miko Lira

reviews.title: Alright
reviews.comment: It\'s one of the nicer and cute bubble shoot games, but the constant random ads that are almost impossible to avoid pressing, forcing you to leave the game, are pretty horrible. Also, it would be nice if you could have a Help or How-To-Play screen for all the power-ups and special bubbles. I have no idea what each is and usually have to waste one to see what it does.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time downloading this app! The only way to get power UPS is to buy them (keep in mind this is a free to play game) the bubbles they give you to shoot are usually the ones at the to p you can barely see or are underneath alot of others! The worst app I\'ve ever downloaded IM deleting this!
reviews.author: Hanna Miller

reviews.comment: Great graphics. Seemingly simple to start but gets you hooked trying to win on the higher levels - LOVE IT :-)
reviews.author: Alison O\'Neill

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Somewhat OK not the best but still pretty good challenging and that is what I like challenges
reviews.author: Tiffany Mynatt

reviews.comment: MY NAME IS BIG BLACK IN I LOVE THIS.
reviews.author: Shanice Pratt

reviews.title: Bubble bird rescue
reviews.comment: Its so nice this game I luv it......thats why im addected to play this game.
reviews.author: Luzviminda Zareno

reviews.title: \"Give us yer cash to play\'
reviews.comment: Was hoping to find a game that said \"free to play\' not lie to me. Level 11 -stuck because of insufficiency of balls which are mostly for the colours that you can\'t even see. The game offers 3 extra balls to finish the game TO BUY of course.
reviews.author: Katie Tuck

reviews.title: Bubble Bird Rescue
reviews.comment: Very challenging, lots of fun
reviews.author: Dianalea Gosnell

reviews.title: Same old.  . .
reviews.comment: Despite the \'upgrade \' it\'s still their game not yours.
reviews.author: Judy Clark

reviews.title: Too hard
reviews.comment: I got stuck on level 21 like most other people. So I got bored with it and uninstalled it.
reviews.author: April D

reviews.title: Level 28 sucks
reviews.comment: Even after the update level 28 still to hard, not enough balls to finish, its ridiculous,  I\'m  not paying to pass the level cuz  i downloaded  because its free. I probably will uninstall.
reviews.author: Valeria Da Silva

reviews.comment: Excellent time wasting fun

reviews.title: Plz help after level 11 game can\'t be played need a full version
reviews.comment: But over all it\'s a good game

reviews.comment: Gud n very addictive game...loving it...wud have had given 5 stars but at it crashes...!! Fix d problem Plssssssss....
